"Yes, it is. It is funny and slimy," Lily said.

at Tim and said, "See? I can count to fifteen. You can't."
Tim felt embarrassed. He did not know how to count more than ten. He wanted to cry. He said, "That's not fair. You are older than me. You know more than me."
Lily felt sorry for Tim. She did not want to make him sad. She said, "I'm sorry, Tim. You are right. I am older than you. I learned how to count more than ten at school. But you can learn too. You are very good at counting to ten. That's a lot of

for them, and some things are not. The pigeon is fine, it just flew away to find some more bread. Next time, we'll bring more bread for you to share, okay?"
"Okay, mom," Ben and Lily said. They hugged mom back and said, "We love you, mom. You're great."

stopped and felt sad. He watched helplessly as the balloons floated far away into the sky.
The next morning, Tim woke up feeling a bit more hesitant about going to the mailbox. But when he arrived, he found that all the balloons had returned and were now tied together to a post near his mailbox. The wind had brought them back to him! 
Tim was overjoyed and cried tears of happiness. He learned an important lesson: always be kind and patient as your treats will always come back!

a wealthy lady who loved to dance. She wore a big, red dress and danced in her big house. She had many gifts, but she wanted more friends to dance with her.
One day, a small, funny cat came to her house. The cat knocked on the door and said, "I want to dance with you!" The lady was happy and let the cat in. They danced and laughed all day long.

come back again soon."

drink milk every day. One day, Lily felt miserable because her milk was all gone.
Lily asked her mom, "Where can I find more milk?" Her mom did not answer. Lily was sad and went outside to look for milk. She looked and looked, but she could not find any.
Suddenly, a little cat came up to Lily. The cat said, "I know where to find milk!" Lily was surprised because cats can't talk. She followed the cat to a big cow. The cow gave Lily some milk, and she was happy again. The cat was a magic cat, and they became best friends
